| Arrive/Pass Hendon Down Slow from                                                                               | Depart/Pass Hendon Up Slow            | 1                            |
| Depart/Pass Hendon Up Slow                                                                                      | Arrive/Pass Hendon Down Slow from     | 4                            |
| A 5-minute stop should be applied at this location if propelling into Cricklewood Aggregate Sidings via signals |                                       |                              |
| No timing allowances should be placed between Silkstream Junction or Hendon as there are no intermediate        |                                       |                              |
| signal. Such allowances should be placed approaching Silkstream Junction, Cricklewood or West Hampstead as      |                                       |                              |
| Pathing time required to maintain a TPR compliant headway or junction margin with a train crossing between the  |                                       |                              |
| Fast and Hendon Lines at Silkstream Junction must be placed approaching Hendon in the down direction as there   |                                       |                              |
| is no intermediate signal between Hendon signal WH43 and Silkstream Junction.                                   |                                       |                              |
| Down Slow to Down Slow                                                                                          | Down Hendon to Down Slow              | 3                            |
